summary: THE CAR STRONGLY SMELLED OF GAS AFTER RUNNING FOR SHORT WHILE FOR A LONG TIME. WE IGNORED IT INITIALLY. LATER WE REALIZED THAT THE ODOR WAS TOO STRONG TO IGNORE AND WE HAVE TO OPEN THE WINDOW TO GET THE SMELL OUT. THE CAR WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO MADE SOME CHANGES. IT WAS TAKEN CARE OF. BUT THE SMELL RE-APPEARED AFTER A COUPLE OF WEEKS AND IT WAS EXTREMELY STRONG DURING THE EXTREME COLD WEEK, END OF JANUARY 2019. OPENED THE HOOD AND CHECKED THE ENGINE OIL LEVEL AND THE OIL LEVEL WAS TOO HIGH.
